The Worlds First Socioeconomic Symposium.

August 14th 2021

Symposium Held in Virtual Setting

The competition will consist of two parts.

TThe first part of the competition will include a presentation on high level empirical studies that have extensive data analysis. This presentation will be displayed by the member(s) entered in the symposium, authors to their respective research papers.

Read more about the first part here!

The second part of the competition will feature a Policy Writing Marathon in which students will draft policy based on their lobbyable research. Each part of the symposium requires a separate ticket, but participants may choose to enter either only the first or second portions of the competition. Participants who do not win in the first part of the competition may still enter the Policython portion of the event.

Read more about the second part here!

Tickets start at $15.
